items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a user updates a task status, all other team members see the change within 2 seconds.
Task updates are reflected without requiring a manual page refresh.
non_functional: System should handle at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Updates must be delivered with latency under 2 seconds.

items.title: Shared Project Boards
items.description: Allow teams to create and manage shared boards for organizing tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create a new shared board and invite team members.
All invited members can view and edit tasks on the board.
non_functional: Board loading time should be under 1 second for up to 500 tasks.

notes: The requirement is high-level and lacks details on specific collaboration features such as chat, file sharing, or permissions. Assumed core collaboration features include real-time updates and shared boards.
